org.apache.flink.runtime.executiongraph.restart

类 FixedDelayRestartStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.executiongraph.restart.FixedDelayRestartStrategy
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    RestartStrategy

    public class FixedDelayRestartStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
implements RestartStrategy
    Restart strategy which tries to restart the given ExecutionGraph a fixed number of times with a fixed time delay in between.

    • 嵌套类概要

        public int getCurrentRestartAttempt()

      • canRestart

        public boolean canRestart()
        从接口复制的说明: RestartStrategy
        True if the restart strategy can be applied to restart the ExecutionGraph.
        指定者:
        canRestart 在接口中 RestartStrategy
        返回:
        true if restart is possible, otherwise false

      • restart

        public void restart(RestartCallback restarter,
                    ScheduledExecutor executor)
        从接口复制的说明: RestartStrategy
        Called by the ExecutionGraph to eventually trigger a full recovery. The recovery must be triggered on the given callback object, and may be delayed with the help of the given scheduled executor.

        The thread that calls this method is not supposed to block/sleep.

        指定者:
        restart 在接口中 RestartStrategy
        参数:
        restarter - The hook to restart the ExecutionGraph
        executor - An scheduled executor to delay the restart

      • createFactory

        public static FixedDelayRestartStrategy.FixedDelayRestartStrategyFactory createFactory(Configuration configuration)
                                                                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates a FixedDelayRestartStrategy from the given Configuration.
        参数:
        configuration - Configuration containing the parameter values for the restart strategy
        返回:
        Initialized instance of FixedDelayRestartStrategy
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception
